title: Iris+
summary: Alternative mobile application for Iris (version 2.0) home automation system.
description: This application is an alternative to the official Iris mobile application.  This app requires that you have an Irisâ„¢ connected home system & sign up at https://www.irisbylowes.com. This application is in no way affiliated with Lowes or Iris by Lowes and is provided without any warranty. Because of this, it is possible that this application may stop working at anytime there is a change of Iris backend by Lowes. This is one of the risks of using a third party application which provides functionality without an official API by the service provider. Paid version unlocks all of the other features below:Devices with temperature, status and morePresence, including ability to use your mobile device as a keyfob (requires Lowes Premium service)Get notified when devices disconnectGet notified when devices have low batteryGet notified when your hub firmware is updatedGet notified when Iris platform is upgradedGet notified when device signal goes to 0Custom rules triggered by IFTTT or Tasker (requires Lowes Premium service to run Scenes)WidgetsVoice ControlHub informationRules (requires Lowes Premium service)Scenes (requires Lowes Premium service)Android Wear companion app (voice control)And more features will be added soon.If you see any issues in the app, please feel free to contact support@80degreeswest.com.
descriptionHTML:
This application is an alternative to the official Iris mobile application. This app requires that you have an Iris™ connected home system & sign up at https://www.irisbylowes.com. This application is in no way affiliated with Lowes or Iris by Lowes and is provided without any warranty. Because of this, it is possible that this application may stop working at anytime there is a change of Iris backend by Lowes. This is one of the risks of using a third party application which provides functionality without an official API by the service provider.

Note: This application works with Iris version 2.0.

Free version lets you view the dashboard and history, control your switches locks, thermostat and irrigation devices. Paid version unlocks all of the other features below:

Devices with temperature, status and more
Presence, including ability to use your mobile device as a keyfob (requires Lowes Premium service)
Get notified when devices disconnect
Get notified when devices have low battery
Get notified when your hub firmware is updated
Get notified when Iris platform is upgraded
Get notified when device signal goes to 0
Custom rules triggered by IFTTT or Tasker (requires Lowes Premium service to run Scenes)
Widgets
Voice Control
Hub information
Rules (requires Lowes Premium service)
Scenes (requires Lowes Premium service)
Android Wear companion app (voice control)

And more features will be added soon.

If you see any issues in the app, please feel free to contact support@80degreeswest.com.
comments: Why do you need detailed personal information such as my addresss? Too invasive of a innocuous device. Convenience only gets you so much access.

Pretty useless compared to the first generation.  They are pretty much trying to force you into a subscription service.  You should at least have the same functionality in your phone and you do with the online login.  You have zero control over your thermostats schedule from your phone , unless you get premium.
What does this ap even do, I have almost not functionality at all. And I paid 9.99 for nothing wth?
Thank you.  Made iris integration better
Great work, good supplement to Iris. Especially with ITTT integration
recentChanges: -Direct IFTTT integration (Removed Dropbox as a dependency, please set up your IFTTT rules using the following tutorial: http://80degreeswest.com/apps/irisplus/whatsnew.php).
